content_by_page.0: parent:div:[parent:p:[text:Forensics,text:Mobile and Classroom Demonstrations,text:Pharmaceutical],text:Air Science manufactures enclosures to meet any specialized filtration need. Common applications for our products include:]
content_by_page.1: parent:div:[text:Safekeeper Forensic Evidence Drying Cabinets provide cost-effective storage and containment for forensic evidence as it is dried by a constant flow of air. Air Science® ductless technology removes airborne pathogens, particulates, fumes and odors emitted by the contents. Using innovative filtration technology, the forensic evidence drying cabinet creates a safe work environment over the widest range of applications in the industry.,text:State and Federal Crime Laboratories \ Medical Examiners and Coroners \ Law Enforcement Agencies \ Hospital Emergency Rooms \ Drug Agencies]

content_by_page.0: parent:select:[text:Custom ENCLOSURE™ Series,text:Drug KEEPER™ Storage Cabinets,text:EDU™ Ductless Classroom Demonstration Fume Hoods,text:Fume CHAMBER™,text:Horizontal Laminar Flow Cabinets,text:Mobile Evidence Transporters,text:Mobile Forensic Evidence BENCH™,text:Purair® ADVANCED Ductless Fume Hoods,text:Purair® BASIC Ductless Fume Hoods,text:Purair® BIO Biological Safety Cabinets,text:Purair® CAGEX,text:Purair® DUCTED Basic Fume Hood,text:Purair® DWS™ Ductless Downflow Workstations,text:Purair® ECO Green Performance Ductless Fume Hoods,text:Purair® FLEX Glove Bags,text:Purair® FLOW Laminar Flow Cabinets,text:Purair® FUMEBOX™,text:Purair® LF Series, Vertical Laminar Flow Cabinets,text:Purair® NANO Ductless Nanoparticle Containment Enclosures,text:Purair® PCR Laminar Flow Cabinets,text:Purair® RX Ductless Balance Enclosures,text:Purair® SKY Ceiling Mounted Air Filtration,text:Purair® SafeSEARCH Ductless Fume Hoods,text:SafeDEVELOP™ DFO and Ninhydrin Fingerprint Development Chamber,text:SafeFUME™ 360 Automatic Cyanoacrylate Fuming Chambers,text:SafeFUME™ Automatic Cyanoacrylate Fuming Chambers,text:SafeKEEPER® COLD,text:SafeKEEPER® Forensic Evidence Drying Cabinets,text:SafeSTORE® Vented Chemical Storage Cabinets,text:SafeSWAB® Swab Drying Cabinets,text:Select Product,text:UV-Box Benchtop Decontamination Chambers,text:UV-Box Decontamination Chambers,text:Vent BOX™,text:Vented ENCLOSURE™ for Compounding and Powder Weighing]

content_by_page.0: parent:div:[parent:p:[text:We build custom enclosures for specific customer requirements and applications. Each unit is designed to maximize operator safety and accessibility, and is tested and certified to factory specifications and industry standards.],text:Customized Cabinet and Containment Enclosures]
content_by_page.1: parent:div:[parent:p:[text:The Evidence Transporter is a special-purpose basic evidence transporter and storage cabinet designed to maintain the chain of custody in transport from the field to the laboratory, while allowing effective air-drying prior to evidence processing.],text:Description]

selector: body > section:nth-of-type(2) > div.roweven > div > div.blockcontainer > div.leftblock:nth-of-type(1) > div.introprodtext:nth-of-type(1)

content_by_page.0: parent:div:[parent:ul:[text:Air Science has developed enclosures to accommodate many of the most commonly used robotic systems.,text:Custom enclosures can be designed to protect the process, operator, or both from particulates, fumes and vapors.,text:Customization can range from small modifications of existing standard Air Science models, to completely custom, application-specific enclosures.]]
content_by_page.1: parent:div:[parent:ul:[text:Kraft paper dispenser,text:Lockable storage compartments to secure tools,text:Open storage shelf,text:Optional airflow pod,text:Wheels allowing the bench to be moved throughout the building wherever processing needs to take place.]]
